q1.title: How accurate is Bazi analysis?
q1.answer: Based on traditional theory with modern algorithms. Results are for reference; combine with personal effort and reality.

q2.title: Does inaccurate birth time affect results?
q2.answer: Yes. Accuracy directly impacts charting and analysis. Provide the most accurate time; best within 1 hour.

q3.title: Difference between basic and useful elements analysis?
q3.answer: Basic covers charting and five-element distribution; useful elements digs into pattern and useful/taboo; fortune prediction analyzes specific periods.

q4.title: How to understand professional terms?
q4.answer: We explain terms in plain language. Use 'Chat with Report' for detailed consultation.

q5.title: Can I save the analysis report?
q5.answer: Yes. Click 'Save Report' to export as an image for keeping and sharing.

qa1.q: Q: Is the free Bazi chart accurate?
qa1.a: A: Our AI charting system is based on classic metaphysics with modern algorithms and validated calculations.

qa2.q: Q: What info is required for Bazi analysis?
qa2.a: A: Provide accurate birth date/time and place; we'll generate a detailed report.

qa1.q: Q: What's the basis of date recommendations?
qa1.a: A: We consider almanac auspicious/avoid, personal Bazi, and five-element compatibility to recommend the most suitable lucky days.

qa2.q: Q: What events can be recommended?
qa2.a: A: We support openings, weddings, moving, travel, signing and other important events.

qa1.q: Q: How often is zodiac fortune updated?
qa1.a: A: It updates daily with analysis and advice on career, finance, love and health.

qa2.q: Q: How accurate is the zodiac fortune?
qa2.a: A: Based on classic zodiac theory and modern statistics, combined with AI algorithms, it provides reference guidance.

qa1.q: Q: Is AI metaphysics analysis reliable?
qa1.a: A: Our AI learned from classic texts and practical cases to provide professional analysis and life advice.

qa2.q: Q: What types of questions are supported?
qa2.a: A: We cover career, love/marriage, finance, health and study/exams.

qa.accuracyQ: Q: How accurate is the exam fortune analysis?
qa.accuracyA: A: Based on classic Bazi theory with modern algorithms. Results are for reference; success still relies on preparation and effort.
qa.birthTimeQ: Q: Does inaccurate birth time affect results?
qa.birthTimeA: A: Yes. Birth time accuracy directly affects the chart and analysis. Please provide accurate time within ¬±2 hours.
qa.diffQ: Q: What's the difference between monthly and yearly analysis?
qa.diffA: A: Monthly analysis is more granular for short-term planning; yearly analysis shows overall trends for long-term planning.
qa.badLuckQ: Q: Can I still take exams when fortune is poor?
qa.badLuckA: A: Fortune is only one factor. With preparation, mindset adjustment and following advice, good results are still achievable.
qa.improveQ: Q: How to improve exam fortune?
qa.improveA: A: Follow the advice in results, adjust study methods, choose suitable timing, keep a good mindset and make practical strategies.
